string-array.item: Take Sparky out for a walk

string-array.name: chatMessages
string-array.item: John: Can\'t get groceries tonight. Have a party to got to
Jack: Don\'t worry dude. I got you
John: Thx Jack, I owe you one!
Joe: Don\'t go crazy, John. You gotta take out the trash in the morning and walk the dog.
John: I\'ll try my best not to ;)
